t: Northwell Health: Rebranding a Health Care Giant
s: May 12, 2023 - As of September 2015, Northshore-LIJ became Northwell Health. The rebrand represents a 7+ year journey to reach broader audiences, unify 21 hospitals and thousands of employees, and simplify a brand promise that had become complex amidst a cluttered portfolio.
